Posts.Content: I had Da Vinci prostactomy 3 months ago but I still fell little pain around de scar drain area (left side bela) mainly when I walk and touch area with fingers.My doctor said that regading pain around the scar drain area perhaps is a sperms pression who want go up??, about the scar pain when I touch it said perhaps can be a little wire from suture that still remains. he put me in antiinflamatories. Someone had it pos op ???
Posts.Signature: Age 59, Pre Op PSA 3,0 , Da Vinci robotic prostactomy in Argentine, on 10 November 2012, Biopsy before surgery Gleason score 3+3 =6, after surgery Gleason score 3+4=7, Stage T2c, all cancer was confined within prostate capsule, none found in margins or lymph nodes , positive for perineural invasion, nerve sparing .
Posts.Title: Scar pain
